review: I have a dvd player that offers lots of options like DirecTv, You Tube etc.,  but Amazon Prime is not one of them.  I bought this and love it.  It is easy to install, easy to use, and I am totally impressed with the programming options.  Amazon is continually getting better in this field.  I can't wait until I can cut my Cable/Satellite connection.

review: Fire TV Stick was a Christmas from a grandson and installed it in our television and my smart phone.........however, we have only 3g in our small town; when we try to stream a movie we get frequent delays as the screen goes into the downloading "circle" on the screen which is very annoying so we have reverted to dvds. It's now Amazon's fault the device did not work very well, not Amazon's fault.  Maybe we'll live long enough to see our town install 4g and we'll get to use our Stick.  Sorry. I gave a three star for the Stick because we can't use it properly.
